text: Marco Pirinoli (born 24 October 1966) is an Italian former sailor who has imported the title of World Champion Tornado (a catamaran close to the F18) and two participations in J.O. in 1992 and 1996 with his brother Walter. He was also 16 years old, World Champion on Moth for the Yacth Club of Cannes (1982). His brother was also a sailor, Walter Pirinoli. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Tornado Category:Europe class world champions Category:Tornado class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Italy
title: Marco Pirinoli
